name: The Unheroic Tales of Eris
description:
Story

For hundreds of years chaos reigned in the world, monsters raided villages, caused havoc and struck fear in the hearts of people, until a Hero fought against them and defeated this evil... But this is not his tale, it's the Unheroic Tales of Eris, the one responsible for all this chaos.

Alex, the Hero started a siege in your castle and it's your job to keep the good guys from taking your kingdom and making everyone else's lives easier! 

Fight through all the kingdoms and reclaim your territory with an iron fist! 
There are no good endings, no Hero, only Chaos, and it's your job to show this to them!


Features

  • Engaging melee combat - Fight your enemies using your Enchanted Sword or your arsenal of Elemental Powers, but first you have to take them back from the Elemental Kingdoms!
  • Finishing moves - Attacking your enemies is usually not enough, your sword can only drain their SOUL! Finish them to show your true power!
  • Non-linear Levels - Explore the world at your leisure, choose your own path to recovering all the powers, which kingdom will you claim first? The choice is completely yours!
  • Master your Play Style - Hone your skills to perfection by S-Ranking stages and receive additional rewards for that!
  • Collect Amulets - Collect all Amulets scattered through the levels and try different play styles! Amulets can give simple effects or entirely change the way you play, can you find them all?

The game is currently being developed, so feedback is appreciated. The team at Updog Software say thank you to all our players, we hope you enjoy this Demo!
